boardgame.name: 7 Sirens
Seven Sirens
boardgame.description:
Summary of Game
Sirens of the past, present, and future - unite! Meet all these sexy seductresses who are all thirsting for your dick...and your dick only!
In the world of 7 Sirens, you will be transported to the adventure of a lifetime. Enjoy an engaging mix of visual novel storytelling and match 3 mechanics, and battle terrifying monsters on your way to success in this entertaining puzzle RPG hentai game!

Key Features
STORY

Through a mysterious portal, you are able to take a glimpse into previous lives that you and your soulmate have led. Visit each incarnation through each Siren’s story! Play unique storylines and explore numerous worlds depending on who you choose. From LARPing high schoolers, consorts of space pirate queens to rival commanders in Feudal Japan, we’ve got them all! Embark on a journey that is sure to get your blood pumping!

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: Knitting: The Card Game – Booster Pack #1
boardgame.description:
The Booster Pack no. 1 for 'Knitting: the Card Game' is a deck of 70 cards that can be mixed into the base game that gives new actions, new patterns and new yarn cards to choose from.
An additional 4 Cast-on cards and 'blocking mat' are included because when the 64 new cards mixed in, gameplay can support up to five players.

Card breakdown:
38 Yarn Store Cards
16 Pattern Cards
8 Community Cards
2 cards that become a 'Finished Object' Blocking Mat in purple supports a 5th player
4 New Cast-On Cards in purple supports a 5th player
2 instruction cards with a new rule modification allowing more Community Cards to be played

-description from designer

boardgame.name: 7 Angels
boardgame.description:
7 Angels is a Dating Simulator game. An evil Succubus has easily seduced you and cursed your soul to an eternity of endless pain in hell. To remove this curse, you’ll need to become a Sex God and find your way out of the jinx! Use the Dating App and seduce all the 7 angels. If you succeed on them all the curse will be removed and your soul recovered! + you’ll have a great time!!

Source: The Developer Website.

An erotic, rollicking Tactical RPG within the fantasy realm of "Nowhere"! A world threatened with existential consumption by a race of enter-planar nightmares!

Key Features

grow their bond. 56+ pair bond combinations!)

boardgame.name: Cosmic Shock League
boardgame.description:
No matter your taste in babes, the strategic puzzle-game Cosmic Shock League has the right girl for you. From playful kittens to fierce sci-fi warriors, Rogue Games and Nutaku provide it all! As they move through a captivating story, players have a chance to get intimate with a variety of enticing ladies. Mesmerizing players with their sensual dialogue and their even more captivating looks, these ladies are sure to satisfy every desire and more.

Venturing through space, players are introduced to the Cosmic Shock League. This group of powerful ladies are in dire need of assistance and only the player can help defeat enemies in this unique puzzle game! Using their puzzle-solving skills and strategicic implementations of character cards, players do their best to come out victorious as they progress through challenging quests and PVP battles. Although it may seem easy at first, Cosmic Shock League quickly increases in intensity so players should be sure to level-up their cards. This may be done after collecting the right number of character cards from boxes purchased in the store, earned in battle, or collected in daily rewards. These daily rewards can be found by visiting chest at the screen. New offers generate every few hours, all of which you may purchase using in-game currency! So, be sure to visit the store and utilize their fantastic offers and keep an eye out -perhaps the card you need will be available!
Players should be weary in battle. With only three possible moves per turn, it is important they use they play strategically. Additionally, they should make sure paying attention to their cards at the side which they may bring into play for a bonus such as health, additional damage, and more. Because of these special abilities, players should be smart about their deck combinations before proceeding to a quest! For instance, when battling against a boss it might be a good idea to use cards that deal physical damage due to the brute strength they will be going up against! Unfortunately, I came up defeated against the first boss, however, after re-arranging my deck and combining Cherry, Aster, Kiki, and Fanny, I was victorious against the very difficult opponent! Of course, this combination would not work for every opponent, however, it was the best option against a strong opponent like him. So, players should figure out what works best against which opponents and go from there.
Although gameplay is great on its own, unlocking intimate moments with their breath-taking characters is certainly the high-point of Cosmic Shock League. After obtaining enough character cards, players may level-up their cards and unveil some spicy sex scenes. Playing out some very real fantasies, players will become captivated by the way Rogue Games is able to satisfy desire while indulging the yearn for a sci-fi twist. Even better, if the player wants to watch these moments again, they can simply visit the heart at the bottom right corner of the battle screen and replay it as many times as they want. This addition is very much appreciated and should be utilized by the player!

If players are seeking a strategic puzzle game that will also satisfy their sexy sci-fi fantasy, look no more. Cosmic Shock League takes everything a player knows about puzzle games and combines it with their deepest sexual fantasies by using stunning women, tantalizing sex scenes, and dialogue too arousing to mention here. Offering in-game purchases for players too impatient to wait, Rogue Games and Nutaku practically give the player everything they need and more to satisfy their craving for a sexy sci-fi adventure. So, check out Cosmic Shock League if you are ready to experience the wonders of an erotic space quest because this reviewer cannot suggest any game more than this.

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: Down and Out in a Schleswig Sanatorium
boardgame.description:
From the publishers blurb:

The Schleswig Sanatorium; home to members of the criminally insane, the disturbed, and the wretched of Schleswig. King Fathmu is fond of stocking its beds with rivals, family members, and rival family members. A place of utter despair, anyone unlucky enough to find themselves a guest, the gods have certainly deserted them.

The outside is unassuming enough. A three story brick building. Leaded windows with ornate wrought iron bars. A stout solid-wood door. The inside is another matter entirely. Recently the staff has all been murdered by a patient gone rogue. That suits the King’s ends well enough, so no one has bothered to check on things recently.

That brings us to you. What exactly ARE you doing here? 11 pages of mayhem to help you figure it all out...

“Down and Out in a Schleswig Sanatorium” is an independent production by Rugose Kohn and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License.

boardgame.name: Marching Band(-imals)
boardgame.description:
Marching Band(-imals) is a tabletop, marching band-themed card game - but all the band members are animals! You are a band director, build a band for the upcoming marching band (football) season. Compete against up to 6 other opponents to build your band the fastest. Play bonus cards to make your band-building more efficient. Play penalty cards to limit the success of your opponents. Your band is complete when you have 5 players and corresponding pieces of equipment while avoiding duplication. Once your band is complete, grab a Drum Major card and hold onto it for one full round to win!

-description from publisher

boardgame.name: Electric Empires
boardgame.description:
A Game of Power and Intrigue in the Gilded Age

The war of the currents is raging. Thomas Edison’s direct current is safe, cheap and simple, but weak. Nikola Tesla’s alternating current is powerful, but complicated and occasionally deadly. Which technology will power New York City and then the world?

As the leader of a fledgling electric company you must hire staff, build generators and power lines, win bids, complete projects…and sabotage the competition. Build your Electric Empire and power the gilded age.

Electric Empires is an engine-building, worker placement game set in the gilded age of New York City. A unique shared reputation mechanism balances semi-cooperative strategy with cut-throat competition. Asymmetric gameplay means different power currents require different strategies and tactics providing great replayability.

Electric Empires is played over the course of 10 years (rounds) each consisting of four quarters (turns). Each turn a player may take two actions: initiating a bid on a project, hiring or assigning workers, building generators, seeking financing or playing action cards.

Each year (round) progress must be made on active projects, debt must be retired or interest paid and maintenance must be performed on in-play power generators.

Completing projects is the main way to gain victory points. Each project represents providing power to a historic location in glided age New York City. Project contracts are acquired through bidding against competing players in terms of how much money you want to complete the project, how long it will take you and the current reputation of your electrical current AC or DC.

In addition to the workers necessary to complete a project you must build generators to supply sufficient power. These generators must be either located adjacent to the project on the gameboard or connected by powerlines which you can also build. Power can be leased either from one of two public utilities or from a competing player using the same current. Projects can be lost due to a lack of progress or malfunctions. Players can sabotage competitors' projects and potentially take them over and gain the associated victory points.

Careful planning of project bidding and generator placement is necessary to build an engine that will produce enough revenue to fund your commitments and enough energy to power projects once they are complete. If power to a completed project is disrupted, victory points from that project are not counted until power is restored.

Each year (round) a new "Annual Forecast" card is drawn which sets unique conditions for all players for the duration of the year (round).

Players may choose either Thomas Edison's preferred current, Direct Current (CD) or Nikola Tesla's Alternating Current (AC). Each has its own advantages and disadvantages leading to asymmetrical gameplay. Both currents (AC and DC) also have an associated reputation or public perception shared by all players using that current. A good reputation makes winning bids and getting financing easier. A negative reputation makes succeeding more difficult.

At the end of year (round) ten, the player with the most victory points is declared the winner.

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Tranglar
boardgame.description:
TRANGLAR (pronounced "Trànglar") is an abstract strategy game for 2 players with various, multi shaped, colored pieces that players are trying to play onto the board. It is a straightforward yet intelligent game, created to challenge both new and experienced gamers. It plays in around 15-25 minutes, ideal for a quick and challenging gaming experience. Each piece is made up of triangles and has a different color on each side, one for each player, while neutral pieces have the same color on both sides.

Components:

Tranglar Game Board
42 game pieces (17 for each player, 8 neutral)

Goal of the Game:

Each player has to place as many of their pieces on the board in order to take over as much space on it as possible. To achieve this they must place their pieces on the board in such a way that they are protected and as to take over their opponents’ pieces by encircling them and flipping them to their color.

Turn Overview:

During their turn each player can take one of the four following actions:

1. Place a new piece of your color on the board in a valid position. Valid positions are the ones that are unoccupied on the board, and not encircled by the opponents’ pieces. The board is divided in small triangle slots. The piece you place, must take up the total area of the triangles they cover.

2. Replace a piece that is already on the board with other/s of yours. This action allows you to replace one of your pieces which is already placed on the board with more pieces that take up the exact same area, and you have available outside the board, or two or more adjacent pieces you own, which are already placed on the board, with one piece that takes up the exact same area.

3. Attack an opponent’s piece (stealing a piece). This action allows you to steal any one of the opponents' pieces which is already on the board: flip it to your color side and place it outside the board with the rest of your pieces. Then you are obliged to cover that space with at least two of your own pieces which equal in size to the area of the piece you took.

4. You can pass your turn. It is probably not a frequent case, but if it is not possible to do any of the above-described actions or for any reason you wish, you can forfeit your turn.

End of Game:

The player with the most with the most triangular slots on the board with their color, wins.

-description from publisher

boardgame.name: The Wicked Ensemble
boardgame.description:
From the designer:

An ominous drum can be heard from afar, banging away the sanity of those who get trapped in its rhythmic beating. What’s the cause of all this? The Wicked Ensemble, festive skeletons always looking for a crowd to entertain.

Take part in a dance battle orchestrated by merry skeletons and show off your infernal dance moves!

boardgame.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Direchasm – Expoliadores de Khagra
Warhammer Underworlds: Direchasm – Khagra's Ravagers
Warhammer Underworlds: Direchasm – Khagras Verwüster
Warhammer Underworlds: Direchasm – Predoni di Khagra
Warhammer Underworlds: Direchasm – Ravageurs de Khagra
Warhammer Underworlds: Direchasm – Грабители Кхагры
Warhammer Underworlds: Direchasm – 哈格拉蹂躏者
boardgame.description:
Khagra the Usurper and her band of Slaves to Darkness see Direchasm as the site of the culmination of their personal path to glory; a final proving ground where they will earn the attention of the Dark Gods. They mean to turn the mountain to the service of Chaos by desecrating its every chamber through dark sorcery and brutal sacrifice. It was Khagra’s sister Zarshia who led the warband into Beastgrave, but they soon became trapped in a gnashing chamber. Khagra wedged her shield between the cavern floor and the encroaching ceiling before carving a way out of the rocky gullet, and since then, the brutal warriors Cragan and Razek have turned to Khagra for direction. Zarshia has not abandoned her own ambitions, however, and is poised to overturn her upstart sibling when the opportunity arises.

Claim the living mountain in the name of the Dark Gods with Khagra's Ravagers. They're tough, strong, and wield sorcerous power, giving you multiple ways to desecrate Direchasm. Speaking of which, their new Desecration mechanic can prevent opposing warbands from claiming objectives. This set also includes a number of Universal cards that can be used by any warband in Warhammer Underworlds and you can even add Khagra's Ravagers to your Slaves to Darkness force in Warhammer Age of Sigmar.

This set contains:
- 4x push fit Khagra's Ravagers miniatures – no glue required to assemble
- 4x fighter cards, representing each warrior in your games – Khagra the Usurper, Zarshia Bittersoul, Razek Godblessed, and Dour Cragan
- A further 62 playable cards (only available in this set) to enhance your fighters and provide new tactics and challenges for your games of Warhammer Underworlds: Direchasm, including:
- 12x Khagra's Ravagers Objective cards
- 10x Khagra's Ravagers Upgrade cards
- 10x Khagra's Ravagers Ploy cards
- 10x Universal Objective cards, usable by any warband
- 10x Universal Upgrade cards, usable by any warband
- 8x Universal Gambit cards, usable by any warband
- 2x Universal Gambit Spell cards, usable by any warband with a wizard
- 1x Desecration Tokens rules card

boardgame.name: Wanna Hocka Lugie
boardgame.description:
Follow in the footsteps of the ancient Hawaiians in Wanna Hocka Lugie, the trading game inspired by the legend of Ka'ao. Players head to the Hawaiian marketplace in a race to fill their baskets. Each player controls two pawns - one that can trade goods and one that can steal goods from the baskets of other players. There's a delicate balance as players map out their acquisition strategy - trade or steal - and all the while avoiding thievery themselves! Players begin with a basket containing three items. By landing one's trading pawn (Tally Trader) on various items, a player can trade up for more valuable goods, stepping up the value of the items in his basket. Maneuvering one's stealing pawn (Shifty Shorty) onto the same space as an opponent's trader gives him the opportunity to shortcut the whole system and pick up valuable goods the "easy" way. Trade and steal. Steal and trade. Twists, turns, and a little bit of luck keep it close until the end. Who will return triumphantly from the market as the Big Kahuna?

Contents include: Game Board, 4 Trading Pawns, 4 Stealing Pawns, 2 Dice, 4 Trading Basket Placards, 54 Item Cards.

boardgame.name: Avatar: The Last Airbender Uncle Iroh's Dream
boardgame.description:
In Uncle Iroh's Dream, follow the wise firebender's sage advice and craft your own cartoon stories using characters, locations, events, animals and special item cards! Save your favorite written stories as mementos and use the White Lotus tile, Avatar state and Appa tokens to make your story more unique! Each game is designed for 3 to 10 players, and runs for 15 to 30 minutes.

Players take turns playing cards as story elements to Uncle Iroh's dream, all while the sand time trickles down, voting on the elements that will be included as the story moves forward.

The rules also contain variant game rules, including:
- King Bumi's "Mad Genius" Mode
- Tea From the Spirit World
- Uncle Iroh and Zuko Variant
- In My Opinion Variant
boardgame.boardgamefamily: TV Shows: Avatar The Last Airbender/Legend of Korra

boardgame.name: Phrase Daze
boardgame.description: Divide into teams/players and place the deck of 50 cards facedown in the middle. The team going first turns over a card and tries to guess the well-known phrase that the image represents. The team/player has three guesses. One of the opposing teams/players can check if they guess the correct interpretation (answer). If the active team guesses the correct answer, they get a point. If they don’t guess the correct answer within three guesses, they don’t get a point. Play then passes to the next team/player. The first player or team to score fifteen points wins.

boardgame.name: Avatar: The Last Airbender Oh, My Cabbages!
boardgame.description:
Take Aang, Katara, Zuko and even the cabbage merchant around the world of Avatar: The Last Airbender while starting new cabbage stands, mastering the elements, looting coins from your opponents and sending security platypus bears to shut down the competition. Play as your favorite character and build your very own cabbage empire. Everyone else will be yelling, "Oh, my cabbages!"

Each round players take turns placing their merchant at different locations and performing corresponding actions: discovering locations, building cabbage stands, saving coins in the starting stand, looting other player's stands, hiring employees, hiring benders, hiring security platypus bears to attack other stands, visiting Uncle Iroh's tea shop to defend their stands, drawing messenger hawk cards, drawing defense cards, and claiming the 1st player token for next round.

Looting and attacking are resolved as they occur, and players may use benders to defend, and even counter to set up a bender duel. At the end of the round, players collect available income from their owned stands and begin the next round. In rounds 7-12, players are granted a 2nd merchant, taking turns in a "snake draft" order, and starting stand incomes increase.

At the end of the 12th round players count up their unspent coins plus hired employees (+2 coins), damage tokens (-2 coins), benders (+3 coins) and owned stands (+10 coins). The player with the most coins wins.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: TV Shows: Avatar The Last Airbender/Legend of Korra

boardgame.name: Flight of the Snow Pearl
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The heroes are dispatched into the snowy Ice Binder Mountains to meet a mysterious contact and escort them back to safety in Aldis. Who is “the Snow Pearl” and why must they now flee from the dark and deadly Kingdom of Kern? Moreover, what dangers pursue them and can the envoys overcome them make it back home?

Flight of the Snow Pearl is a Blue Rose AGE adventure for 4 to 6 characters, levels 2 to 4.

boardgame.name: Echoes of the Labyrinth
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

The heart of the labyrinth calls out your name. Your very soul yearns to cross the liminal threshold and delve deep, seeking the promised treasures of ancient times. The labyrinth is a trickster, a living monument god who thrives on the lost and lonely.

Echoes of the Labyrinth is a roleplaying game of minimal proportions. One participant becomes the Heart of the Labyrinth, or Heart. They play the characters and monsters within the monument god’s walls - kind and savage alike. They set the traps, craft the puzzles and adjudicate the rules. The other players are Yearning Delvers - those who have answered the soul call of the Labyrinth. They be warriors, scoundrels and sorcerers.

boardgame.name: S.M.ARTS RPG
boardgame.description:
Super Martial Arts RPG

Publisher's blurb:

S.M.ARTS RPG brings the world of the super martial arts to your game table. Inspired by anime like Dragon Ball and Saint Seiya, and games like Street Fighter and King of Fighters, this RPG is your gateway to infinite worlds of super warriors and epic fights.

Within this book, you will find a complete and unique roleplaying experience for players and Game Masters—an original, combat-oriented system that explores this “anime-energy-fighting genre” and gives you guidance on how to create your own worlds and adventures.

boardgame.name: The Night Market
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The criminal Silence, so subtle within the Kingdom of the Blue Rose, occasionally hosts the Night Market, an underground auction of goods forbidden and illegal. Assigned to infiltrate just such a Night Market being held in the Veran Marsh, can the heroes successfully recover a shard of the sorcerous Shadow Heptagram?

The Night Market is a Blue Rose AGE adventure for 4 to 6 heroes of levels 3–5.

NOTE: The Night Market also appears in the adventure collection Six of Swords, available for purchase separately.

boardgame.name: The Sixth Beast
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Trebutane fled the tyranny of Kern for the northerly reaches of the Pavin Weald. But now, they are prey to others: The bandits known as the Five Beast Army prey on the reclusive Trebutane. Can the heroes sent by the Crown uncover and resolve the deep conflicts at play here?

The Sixth Beast is a Blue Rose AGE adventure for 4 to 6 heroes of levels 1–4.

NOTE: The Sixth Beast also appears in the adventure collection Six of Swords, available for purchase separately.

boardgame.name: Storms Over Kamala
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A Rezean witch seeks aid to help free the old wintering grounds of her clan from dark and sinister influences. When she approaches the heroes for help, will they journey to the horse-plains of Rezea to discover what wickedness lies in wait?

Storms Over Kamala is a Blue Rose AGE adventure for 4 to 6 heroes of levels 9–12.

NOTE: Storms Over Kamala also appears in the adventure collection Six of Swords, available for purchase separately.

boardgame.name: The Mistress of Gloamhale Manor
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

In the newly-settled Husqan Valley, the children are disappearing. The heroes are called upon to investigate these disappearances, and all paths lead to the ancient Gloamhale Manor. What dark secrets await within?

The Mistress of Gloamhale Manor is a Blue Rose AGE adventure for 4 to 6 heroes of levels 1–4.

NOTE: The Mistress of Gloamhale Manor also appears in the adventure collection Six of Swords, available for purchase separately.

boardgame.name: A Harvest of Masks
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

NOTE: A Harvest of Masks also appears in the adventure collection Six of Swords, available for purchase separately.

boardgame.name: A Wanton Curse
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

NOTE: A Wanton Curse also appears in the adventure collection Six of Swords, available for purchase separately.

boardgame.name: Tiny Taverns
boardgame.description:
Introducing a new way to play the Tiny D6 engine. Tiny Taverns is a roleplaying game about the slice-of-life daily adventures of tavern proprietors in a high fantasy setting. Instead of warriors, wizards, and thieves, player characters are bartenders, performers, servers, chefs, or even bouncers… who also happen to be warriors, wizards, and thieves!

Attribution: from the back of the book

boardgame.name: Stonewall Uprising
boardgame.description:
Stonewall Uprising is a two-player asymmetric deck-building game in which you play as either The Man or Pride, fighting for or against equal rights.

On your turn, you can either play a card from your hand or fold. Playing cards moves one of three tracks in the game; Systemic Support, Public Opinion, and Individual Support. Getting to the end of these tracks gives the side it lands on an immediate effect, and then resets it to the middle of the track. Folding allows you to take the value of your hand at the end of the round and gain new cards from your market, but be warned - once you have folded your opponent's cards are doubled in value! You will however get to draw a card for each card they play while you are folded, but will that be worth it?

As the decades progress from the 1960s, to the 1970s, and finally to the 1980s, watch as your strategy and tactics stretch and morph based on the changing tides. Events can sway certain strategies, and the cards you're able to buy shift as the decades pass.

The Man's goal is to detain and demoralize 10 people from Pride's deck to take the wind out of Pride's movement. Pride's goal is to shift the Overton Window and to organize protests, demonstrations, and sit-ins to sway the public, represented by their dice pool, to keep their movement's momentum going well past the 80s. The game ends immediately when either of these conditions have been met.

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Improper Nouns
boardgame.description:
SUMMARY

What's in a name? The choice is yours!

Improper Nouns is a card-based party game for generally fun humans and proper word nerds.

Discover more about your friends, share some laughs, and reveal new inside jokes. With more than 100,000 potential combinations, it's a new game every time. You’ll never see words the same way!

BASIC GAMEPLAY

1) The judge draws an Adjective card and a Noun card and puts them together. Ex. Lucky Stranger

2) Choose a Description card from your hand that best "fits" the combination. You can be literal, creative, or crazy!

3) The judge picks a winner from all players entries.

CURVEBALLS

Swap 1 --- Swap 3 --- Split

These cards might show up when the Judge draws a Noun card. They’re hidden in the Noun deck and mix up the gameplay!

BONUS CARDS

Each round, check to see if the Adjective + Noun pair is notable in any of these ways. If it is, the winner earns a Bonus, too! (Note, if someone else wins a future hand, they TAKE your bonus card!)

RHYME TIME -- ADJ. + N. RHYME
LETTER LOVE -- ADJ. + N. START WITH THE SAME LETTER
SAME SAME BUT DIFFERENT -- ADJ. + N. SHARE THE SAME ROOT WORD
AN ACTUAL THING -- ADJ. + N. FORM A "REAL" PROPER NOUN

GOAL

Win the game by winning 7 rounds and collecting the Adjective and Noun cards. Note: Bonus cards count the same as winning a round!

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Coronavirus le jeu
boardgame.description:
The game begins at the start of the coronavirus epidemic, when a few people are starting to feel the first symptoms...

When the game starts, only some players are infected, but after a few handshakes, hugs and other dinners with friends, the number of cases is likely to increase rapidly!

There are two ways you can win:

be the last to survive the outbreak or
the first to be immune.


A player is immune if he does not suffer any contamination for 3 full turns after healing.
A player dies if their viral load exceeds 5.

– translated description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Where in the World?
boardgame.description: Place the deck of 50 cards facedown in the middle. One player begins as the guessers. Another players draws a card from the pile and gives clues. There are three clues on each card. The first is the hardest level and is worth 3 points. The second is medium difficulty level and is worth 2 points. The last is the easiest level and is worth 1 point. The questions are asked in order and the guesser and can try to guess the location after each clue. If the guesser guesses correctly, they score points according to the number of clues needed (1=3, 2=2, 3=1). If the location is not guessed, the player does not score points. The next player then becomes the guesser and a new card is drawn. The first player to score 15 points wins.

boardgame.name: The Hateful Place
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

A Role Playing Game System for One and/or More players.

For settings from all times and all places provided that they are in Darkness. This is alternate history, present and future in a world gone very wrong.

Welcome. Welcome to The Hateful Place. May you find it both engaging and miserable. Welcome to a place and time somewhere in the past, present, or future. A place upon which a darkness fell and never went away. A place in which there is only light for roughly one hour a day. Welcome to a world that became a hateful place immediately the darkness fell, bringing its demons with it, and monsters from out of their hiding places, to curse a broken Earth.

A 3 dice system for people who like dark games.

boardgame.name: VICTIMSHIRE
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

1423 and King Henry the Fifth has fallen to the darkness at the Second Battle of Agincourt.

In England, demons and monsters roam the now dark and devastated land. The county of Victimshire needs somebody brave.

Two adventures, this huge release also has two appendixes full of new Character Classes, fantasy maps, character progression tables, and much, much more! Pregen PCs and NPCs included!

Will you take up the commission to travel across the county, break into the monster infested Molby Manor to bring back the head of the vampire Lady Jane Molby to release her from her curse? Or will you map the county in the giallo style adventure in which a serial killer is coming for your party?

Welcome to Victimshire. Try not to die.

Suitable for two or more Players and a Referee.

boardgame.name: The Hateful Place BOOK B
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

More dark things to add to your The Hateful Place game. Book B has Time Travel, Superheroes, another class, plus more Generators useful for tHP. as well as other RPG systems. and more!

boardgame.name: The Caves of Lady Caroline Vey
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

It is 1423. The darkness covers the world. Having escaped by ship along the English coastline (following the events of “HOP HOP MY DEAD FROG”), the players (plus any additional PCs/NPCs that have been rescued from boats en route) find themselves sailing close to the rocky coastline, using it as cover in case of demonic/monstrous aerial attacks. Five miles east from the rocky platforms of “Hop Hop My Dead Frog” the party will come across caves set into the cliff face. These are The Caves of Lady Caroline Vey. Inside are riches galore and unimaginable terrors. Are you brave enough to enter the caves? A standalone adventure or can be run as the sequel to "Hop Hop My Dead Frog" and prequel to "Victimshire". For 2-8 Players.

boardgame.name: Sirenswail
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

1644, and Civil War rages across England. Oliver Cromwell has taken charge of the opposition to King Charles the First and Cromwell’s New Model Army is gaining victories. England is in chaos. Cromwell is a puritan who has vowed to wipe out evil and sorcery, aligning it with the King’s Court. The young Witchfinder Matthew Hopkins is scouring the land, holding trials and burning at the stake anybody who he considers in league with the powers of darkness or are “freaks against nature, born of the Devil”. Rumours are that there is an island of riches which will fund the escape of those using magic and anybody who stands by them. The island of "Sirenswail". It is to here that adventurers will set sail. Three adventures in one, city, sea, and island, "Sirenswail" contains mature content and is suggested for OSR games including Lamentations of the Flame Princess. It is intended for 5-8 characters of levels 1-3.

boardgame.name: No Rabbits In Rabbit Wood
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

When the darkness fell, all life within the once flowery and wildlife stocked Rabbit Wood was quickly eradicated, becoming food for monsters and demons. All that remained was a dead place throughout which an inescapable and lethal gas hugged the ground. No traveller would pass through the wood again. Rabbit Wood is impossible to enter and survive. The only way to get to the other side is via a series of gas-free tunnels beneath the woods, known locally as the Worm Tunnels. Two days ago, deposed young Queen Tamatha and her entourage entered the tunnels, attempting to reach safety on the other side, her people already waiting for her. Two days have passed and nothing else has been heard. Mission: rescue the Queen. A simple, introductory adventure for The Hateful Place For two to six characters & A suggested two NPCs Requires Core Rules, Book B, and 3.

boardgame.name: Hop Hop My Dead Frog
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

A fun one shot for The Hateful Place. Your party is on the run when it sees a series of stone pillars leading out to sea; a monster is between you and the captive princess and her ship. All you have to do is hop from pillar to pillar, kill the monster, rescue the princess and sail away to safety on her ship. Easy. Not quite! A possible TPK one shot that can be dropped into other games or played by itself.

boardgame.name: 3 Being the Third Book of The Hateful Place
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Book 3 of The Hateful Place contains all new material, including new classes and a whole lot of stuff about flesh and bodysnatching. Always fun. Plus over fifty pages of new generators that you can use in tHp or other games.

boardgame.name: No Place Reich Home
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

A commando raid on a Nazi-occupied castle to retrieve Excalibur! In the Darkness of The Hateful Place, Nazis occupy England and have found the legendary blade. The players, fighting for the Resistance for reasons of their own, must infiltrate the village and castle of Sourhampton-Upon-Stull and steal back England's greatest treasure.

For use with The Hateful Place roleplaying game, this PDF edition features stats for OSR gaming.

boardgame.name: Riders of the Black Sage
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Storm across the black sage in an alternate Arizona gone hellishly wrong. A sandbox adventure for The Hateful Place RPG, this edition includes stats for OSR gaming. Features 26 detailed encounters, new monsters, suggestions for using horses and guns with tHp, and multiple generators to flavor your weird west hellscape.

boardgame.name: Autocat
boardgame.description:
Players are the mayor CATs in the great Three-kingdoms era. Striving to recruit their best general cats to win the battles in three rounds.

Each player has five cards in hand. They may discard any number of cards, and draw from the deck up to 5 cards including their hands. During the battle, the players show their hands
simultaneously and count the icons on their cards to earn the bonuses from the country codes and the types of the arms. The battle starts from the player with more shoes icons. The players attack each other until the HP of a player reaches Zero. The survived player wins the battle and earn the fishes.

The game continues three battles. The player with the most fishes wins the game.

-description from publisher

boardgame.name: Fish! Dash! Cash!
boardgame.description:
This game "Fish! Dash! Cash!" Starts playing games as players become stray cats and gather fish. Sometimes the fish may be snatched and targeted by other cats. Of course, myself may sneak fish from other cats and run away. The ultimate goal is to convert the fish to "cash". You can eat fish, but you can not keep it as food for a long time. But if you can afford it, you can buy it whenever you like, "cat can" or "crispy." Huh! What? Do cats be interested in money? The proverbs are already old like "cats small-size". Even now even cats are doing business ... ....

Each player is dealt 5 cards from the deck. One card is put into the "field" from the first player, and each trick is processed.

Cards are color-coded "blue" and "red" and three types of "role". And cards has a number from 0 to 9.

The card issued by the first player becomes "the lead card", and only the cards that match the color are effectively processed. Cards resolution processes "roles" in descending order of numbers.

These cards are three types of "roles". "Fish", "Cat", and "Money". If you put out "Fish", put it in your "Feeding Area", and if it is "Money", put it in your "Feeding Area". To cash. A "cat" can steal a "fish" from the "feeding ground" to its own "feeding ground" or block another player's "cat" who has come to its "feeding ground". "Cashed fish" cannot be taken by "cats".

When the deck runs out and all the cards are put out, the person with the most "cashed" money in hand wins.

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Disney Villainous: Böse Machenschaften
Disney Villainous: Despicable Plots
Disney Villainous: Monstrueusement malsains
boardgame.description:
In Villainous: Despicable Plots, each player takes control of one of three Disney characters, each one a villain in a different Disney movie, specifically Lady Tremaine (Cinderella), the Horned King (The Black Cauldron), and Gaston (Beauty and the Beast). Each player has their own villain deck, fate deck, player board, and 3D character.

On a turn, the active player moves their character to a different location on their player board, takes one or more of the actions visible on that space (often by playing cards from their hand), then refills their hand to four cards. Cards are allies, items, effects, and conditions. You need to use your cards to fulfill your unique win condition.

One of the actions allows you to choose another player, draw two cards from that player's fate deck, then play one of them on that player's board, covering two of the four action spaces on one of that player's locations. The fate deck contains heroes, items, and effects from that villain's movie, and these cards allow other players to mess with that particular villain.

Villainous: Despicable Plots is playable on its own, and its characters can also face off against those in the other Disney Villainous games.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Dice Dodgems
boardgame.description:
Dice Dodgems is a 30 minute strategy game of dodging and bumping for 2-4 players, designed by City Square Studios.

In Dice Dodgems, players control miniature dodgems as they dodge and bump around the arena. The goal of the game is to be the last dodgem standing. The winner is the last player with dice.

While the game's rules are easy to understand for newcomers, the bouncing mechanics and ability to see and predict other dodgems moves make for a deeper strategic experience, with great replay-ability. A chess-like battle can occur when two or more strategic players bounce around the arena.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Blood Bowl: (Second Season Edition) – Akhorne the Squirrel Star Player Promo Card
boardgame.description: This is a promo card for Akhrone the Squirrel that was contained in White Dwarf #458 (November 2020). This contains all the rules for using the Akhrone star player in your games of Blood Bowl. The official model comes in the Blood Bowl (Second Season Edition): Treeman kit.

boardgame.name: Mozzaroller
boardgame.description:
The newly opened pizzeria "Angelo" cannot save itself from orders. As a scooter-driving pizza deliverer, it is your job to deliver these pizzas to as many customers as possible — but first the pizzas have to be topped with the right ingredients! Can you establish yourself as the customers' favorite deliverator?

Your goal in Mozzaroller is to place dice on customer cards to complete as many orders as possible and to secure the most valuable deliverer tiles.

On a turn, you roll the eight ingredient dice, then place at least one die on a matching ingredient on any customer card; if you place more than one die, you must place all dice after the first on the same customer or on adjacent ones. Next, you decide whether to:


Re-roll with all unplaced dice
Pass


You can re-roll as often as you want, but after each roll you must be able to place at least one ingredient on an already started customer card or a customer card adjacent to a card that already has a die on it. Fail to do this, and you must pass, losing all customers that have not had their orders fulfilled.

You collect all finished customers, and if you now have the most customers of one color in front of you, you take the corresponding deliverer tile and add it to your order cards. Players continue to take turns until the draw pile is emptied, after which players tally their points.

boardgame.name: Senator Senator
boardgame.description:
Ave senator, times are tough within the republic. Barbarians harass Rome from without and corruption seeps from within. You fellow senators are scheming to claim the seat of Emperor for themselves by amassing their influence, might, and wealth. It is up to you, senator, to protect Rome from her foes; both barbarians and corrupt politicians. Either the light and majesty of your Roman Republic will prevail... or someone else will win. Collect Influence, Might, or Wealth cards to challenge the senate and defeat your fellow senators. Play your action cards to advance your political position and elect decrees that work in your favour. But beware for Rome has many enemies. You will have to work together with your fellow senators to protected Rome from Crises and Invasions all while plotting to stab them in the back.

ENTERTAINING FUN: This is a strategic board game for up to eight players that will provide hours of play for family and friends.
GREAT GAMEPLAY: Take on the role of a member of the senate and strive to become Emperor of Rome using your Influence, Might, and Wealth.
162 CARDS: Collect and play Influence, Might, and Wealth action cards to steer the game in your favour. There are many different cards to use against your fellow senators. On the other hand, you may need to work together to overcome crises and invasions.
DEVISE GRAND STRATEGIES: Outsmart and outwit your opponents through clever plans and devious thinking. Bide your time, strengthen your hand, and lure your opponents into your trap to snatch victory from their grasp.
GREAT REPLAY VALUE: The more you play, the better you'll know the cards and the more plans you can create. Enact laws that change the base rules of the game so that every round you play is different.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Last Message
Mensaje final
Nyomok sűrűjében
Posledni Zprava
A Última Mensagem
Σκιτσο-Ντετέκτιβ
Намалюй убивцю
Последнее послание
boardgame.description:
A crime was just committed! The victim is unable to speak — but they can draw, and in doing so they will ideally help the inspectors guess who in the vast crowd is the criminal! This shifty character will do anything and everything to cover their tracks, though, so will you be able to stop them before the last message?

In Last Message, the victim of the crime gives clues over four rounds to help the detectives determine the identity of the criminal. To give clues in a round, the victim has 30 seconds in which to draw and write in a 3x3 grid — but before handing over these clues, the criminal can erase part of these drawings.

If the criminal is not identified by the end of the fourth round, they win the game; otherwise, the detectives and the victim win.

boardgame.name: Crystal Maidens
boardgame.description:
The concept of a harem is vastly popular for solid reasons. One of them being the obvious fact that it basically consists of a group of sexy, willing ladies who are there for your pleasure. With that in mind, how could we not dive deeper into the beautiful world of Crystal Maidens? This game brings the best in adult gaming, including strategy, role-playing and, of course, scalding hot maidens. Like, lots of ‘em.

Your adventure starts with Nuka greeting you and telling you about the dark wizard who controls the minds of an army of maidens. There are shards of his dark tower scattered throughout the land, which must be destroyed before he can be defeated- by you, alongside the maidens you will be summoning to fight. Crystal Maidens won't miss any opportunity to remind you why you've been tasked with this magical - and soon-to-be perverted - mission. From the get go, the game will leave you wanting more.

While Crystal Maidens is filled with graphic and titillating sex scenes, you need to flirt (and succeed at it) in order to get the sexy satisfaction you're looking for. Using the crystals you've collected during missions is part of the strategy, as each of them are tied to an element which your maidens respond to. Trade them for a flirt and see them slowly respond to your curiosity. It only leaves you eager to know more- oh, the sweet taste of impatience! In addition to the long list of available maidens, the game also gives you the opportunity to expand your sexual conquests to Guardians that are more than happy to have you around.

While seduction and romancing is an important gameplay component, Crystal Maidens is a deep role-playing game at its core. Upgrading your maidens as well as planning defense and attack strategies are key elements to the success of your mission. Don’t you go thinking you can just charm your way through and let your ladies do the work. They need you to have their back!

But that is just another great thing about this game; the sheer number of ways to enjoy it. From kingdom building to battle play, you will very soon find your days (and nights) occupied in the sweetest way. And what better way to blow off some steam than battling your way through an extensive storyline, all while losing yourself in some clever writing and highly detailed sex scenes? Once you’re done with the main campaigns, you can test your maidens with a whole other kind of challenge with the Epic Boss Campaign, in which you can craft exclusive items and maidens- but it isn’t going to be an easy one. Needless to say, we can absolutely guarantee you’re going to have a great time.

Now, hurry up warrior! These lands, and hearts, aren’t going to conquer themselves.

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: Blood & Velvet
boardgame.description:
From the designer:

In the city of Yesterday, your past is a weapon, your name a key to your heart.

Blood and Velvet is a game of mystery and tension set in a rubine gothic city. You will tell the story of a crew of improbable criminals that saw something they weren't meant to see. They must uncover the truth of what they have found and the tangled web of conspiracy that surrounds it, while staying ahead of the grim powers that see opportunity in their demise.

4-6 players (including a Game Master).
A campaign of 2-4 hour sessions.
Powered by the Apocalypse and Forged in the Dark.

boardgame.name: Alias: lisäkorttisarja
boardgame.description:
One of the early expansions to Alias - it still carries the Nelospelit logo of the early 1990's.

300 new cards with 8 words each, for a total of 2400 new words to explain.

boardgame.name: Sacred Sword Princesses
boardgame.description:
Picture this: it’s the middle of summer, you’re living through another hot, very hot evening. A thin layer of sweat is covering every inch of your skin, slowly dripping all the way down to your lower back. You’re finally alone, the blue light of your screen reflecting its content in your pupils; it’s time to play Sacred Sword Princesses.

This fast-paced action adventure game takes place on a fantasy continent, in which you are brought to help save from domination. If this is a common situation for gamers to find themselves thrown into, the adorably clueless character you embody is still willing to take one for the team and tag along this crazy adventure. After all, how could you say no to an entire fleet of gorgeous warriors in desperate need of your help? The sacred essence carried in your Sacred Sword (wink wink) is intrinsically linked to the carnal pleasures of heavy training- and the all new power that comes with it.

With its highly interactive gameplay, Sacred Sword Princesses is home to many surprises. As you navigate between battles and worlds, the visual novel graphic style will keep sweeping you off your feet. The elaborated storyline will be presented to you after some of your fights, introducing new elements and twists without ever disturbing the game flow.

To ensure victory, cast your babes’ special spells during their fights, or change characters in the midst of battle to use different attacks on your enemies- they don’t stand a chance. You also have the option to fight alongside other players and become friends with them, as they will help you win. Don’t be shy, this social feature comes with many perks!

There is a very large number of maidens to discover, and they are eventually subjected to levelling up, leading you to score even more bonuses after a certain criteria is reached. Keep a little something in mind though; characters are divided into three battle archetypes (Melee, Range and Magic) and four elemental properties (Fire, Air, Water and Earth). This will be useful when organizing your fighters to go against your enemies.

Not only is this game a delight to navigate, due to the high quality graphics and smooth pace, but it also is highly rewarding. Gamers carry a certain level of expectation when it comes down to RPGs like Sacred Sword Princesses, and this one does not disappoint.
Claimable bonuses are available throughout the campaign, whether it is conquering harder levels, completing event missions or unlocking different worlds one by one after each cleared battle. The Arena feature becomes available as you progress in the game; fight against other players, win extra points and rewards upon victory, and rise through the ranks.

If you find yourself longing for some intimate time, the Harem is where you should be headed. Find your darlings with their unlocked scenes, and rewatch them as many times as you’d like. Here’s a little disclaimer: those scenes are heavily narrated… the room temperature isn’t going to go down.

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: Planes of Eros

Enter the realm of Eros and experience magic through fun and engaging slot machines! Kapitolyo Studio presents Planes of Eros, an exciting RPG, slot machine game available on Android, and on browser. The game features unique characters who will accompany you throughout your fantasy-filled journey.

boardgame.name: The Trace
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Teleporting around the battlefield, traces leave nothing but dead bodies and confusion in their wake. They are ghostly warriors that flicker in and out of existence to bypass any obstacle and overcome any challenge.

boardgame.name: D&D Spell Components List
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A quick reference guide of the D&D 5e spells from the Player's Handbook and the Xanathar's Guide to Everything.

The spells are organized into levels and in alphabetical order.

Each entry includes the spell name, the verbal, somatic and material components (when present).

boardgame.name: Incantations: Skill-Based Magic
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Incantations: Skill-Based Magic introduces a magic subsystem to the Fifth Edition of the World's Oldest Roleplaying Game which is devised around making ability checks.

An incantation is a ceremony that can be performed by one or more characters to invoke a magical effect. Incantations can be invoked by any character, not just those with access to spells and spell slots, and they are designed to reflect such tropes as withering curses, folk magic, and hedge magic. This file includes six incanatations and rules for making more.

This subsystem can be easily introduced to an existing Fifth Edition campaign, or with a bit of work, be used to replace the existing system.

boardgame.name: Burger, Brawl & Blitz
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Danger Room Encounters are combat simulations that combine realistic illusions, hard-light holograms, and matter re-materialization to simulate virtually any environment that offers benefits to both GMs and players. A session in Danger Room Encounters allows heroes to practice their skills and powers without worrying about property damage or bystanders. Heroes can try alternate uses of their powers and experiment with how far they can push those abilities. Danger Room Encounters serves as an excellent, easy way to introduce new players to the game by helping them learn the rules one step at a time.

In this encounter O’Keefe’s – a generic Fast-Food Restaurant - is attacked by the Star Gorgon. The Star Gorgon itself is a rough-skinned alien monster. While the Star Gorgon is formidable physically, its real threat lays with the creature’s “Stone Vision” - a deadly ray of energy emitted from the alien’s eyes that turn those struck to stone.

boardgame.name: Bard Class
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The new Bard Class for Labyrinth Lord includes the following:

Class Details;

The following Bard abilities and skills:
Bardic Instruments
Bonus Languages
Counter-Song
Influence
Inspire
Lore
Perform
Read Languages
Saving Throw Bonus
Spellsongs
Thieving Abilities
Witticisms

A list of spellsongs (normal spells re-interpreted as spellsongs);

A list of musical instruments, including cost, weight, availability (City, Town, Village), and special notes;

The College of Bards, rules for advancements, and rights and responsibilities of members;

Six magna opera, the bardic equivalent of relics, including Diarmuid’s Codex, Firzam’s Pipes of Madness, the Golden Songbird, Howard’s Harp of Heroes, Orpheus’s Lyre, and the infamous Pioban Bais or “Pipes of Death.”

Designed for use with Labyrinth Lord, easily used with any Old School RPG system!

boardgame.name: Sack of Gasulta (5E)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A village in celebration, a sudden raid, and a desperate retreat to safety and fierce struggle to repel the invaders. Gasulta is a quiet provincial town, packed full with seasonal revelers and pilgrims. The party finds themselves in the midst of an unexpected and frantic raid and must fight their way to the keep- either fleeing for their lives or saving the townsfolk they can along the way. At the keep, the siege must be repelled- should its gates fall, whats left of the town will surely be slaughtered.

boardgame.name: Eye of Itral (5E)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Eye of Itral is a “film noir” type adventure set in the town of Cat’s Cradle, written by Ken Spencer. Mysteries and secrets abound, and some of them can be very, very dangerous... This book is intended to be used in tandem with the Cat’s Cradle Sourcebook, also published by Frog God Games.

boardgame.name: Eye of Itral (PF1)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Eye of Itral is a “film noir” type adventure set in the town of Cat’s Cradle, written by Ken Spencer. Mysteries and secrets abound, and some of them can be very, very dangerous... This book is intended to be used in tandem with the Cat’s Cradle Sourcebook, also published by Frog God Games.

boardgame.name: Fortune Hunters (S&W)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Fortune Hunters is a book of non-player characters that may be encountered in any town. Each of the NPCs is detailed at three different points in their history: low level, medium level, and high level. They can be used as recurring allies or villains with ready explanations of what they have been doing since the last time the characters encountered them.The backgrounds of the NPCs assume that the book is being used in tandem with the Cat’s Cradle Sourcebook, also published by Frog God Games, but can be used in any setting.

boardgame.name: Tome of Alchemy (PF1)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Tome of Alchemy contains hundreds of items, dozens of spells, an innovative system for alchemical research, tables to resolve mistakes in the laboratory, alchemy-related adventure hooks, and much,much more!

Bubbling alembics and fiery ovens release the fumes of sweet and noxious gases into the stone-walled laboratory, where mists gather and curl among the rafters. Shelves groan with the weight of clay jars, glass containers, parchment scrolls, boxes of rare minerals, and ancient books forbidden to own.

This is the mysterious domain of the alchemist, and now the secrets of this venerable craft are opened for both players and game masters!

boardgame.description:

boardgame.name: World League Basketball
boardgame.description:
(from the back cover of the game)

World League Basketball combines grat arcade gameplay with state of the art 3D graphics. Using motion capture and real basketball physics to create a detailed simulation that delivers maximum gameplay for sports fans. Featuring 32 national teams, you can battle the might of the US allstars against emerging nations like Croatia and Argentina. With all the stats available at your fingertips you can fight your way through one of the toughest competitions on earth and be basketball champion of the world.

multiplayer option - up to 8 players can compete at once in world league basketball
Excellent graphics that enhance the gameplay with all the players motion captured every move is realistic
From your squad of players, each with their own capabilities field your best team
There are 3 different play modes. Exhibition play, Season play and Tournament play
There are four levels of difficulty from junior to championship
Stats available on all players

boardgame.name: The Midderlands: A Fifth Edition Setting & Bestiary
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Midderlands is an award-winning, weird world-setting for fifth edition (D&D). It’s late middle ages/Tudor England seen through a looking glass, filled with strange creatures, insidious threats, and the color green. It’s edgy, it’s twisted, and the first thing you should expect is the last thing you’d expect. Looking for a 5e setting completely different from anything you’ve seen before? You’ve found it – now let’s see if you can survive it…

A green-hued, dark-fantasy setting and bestiary set in a twisted middle-England.

Situated in the middle of Havenland is an area known by the ancestors as the Middle Havenlands. They don’t use that name much anymore, preferring to talk lazily, and skip letters. In strange accents, often misheard and little understood by those outside of the central region - they call it ‘The Midderlands’, and themselves ‘Midfolk’ or ‘Midderlanders’.

Everywhere though, the Midderlands is tainted by a green-tinged menace that rises from ‘Middergloom’, the deep and mysterious realms beneath the surface. It affects nature and order. Sometimes subtly and sometimes catastrophically. Middergloom is often described as hell bathed in green fire and flames. Green-tinged, viscid slime; noxious, acrid vapours, and miasmas of hopelessness creep upwards from below. Amongst them, viridian-coloured demons, lime-green tentacles and other malachite horrors claw their way to the surface to wreak havoc. The Lords of the land are always working to keep things at bay. They fight endlessly as if holding back a torrent of despair.

Things stir in this viridian-hued landscape. Evil eyes blink and watch. Teeth and claws scratch and sharpen. Gaping maws slobber and drool.

All is not content in the Midderlands.

boardgame.name: Honey Crush
boardgame.description:
Summary of Game
You’ve been transported to a strange realm and forced to compete in The Sex Games by the pervert wizard Manfred.
Seduce all the girls in your path and build a mighty harem.
One more thing: if you lose Manfred will turn you into a sex starved slut and force you to join his harem.

Key Features

BUILD a harem of girls with unique personalities


Seducing girls is hard, but luckily you have a harem to help you.
Work with your top bitch Audrey to break down these girls defenses and get them into bed.


ENGAGING fully animated story


Progress through The Sex Games as you seduce girls, and they seduce each other.
Travel to distant lands and lure the top girls of Manfred’s harem to your side with your sexual prowess.


UNIQUE puzzle mechanics


Every date is unique, and each one gets you closer to your final showdown with Manfred.


COLLECT sexy pictures from your girls


Gather pictures of all the "hard" work you've put into seducing these sluts.


ENHANCE your seduction abilities and unlock bonuses from all the girls in your harem


Use skill upgrades to improve your character and enhance your seduction abilities.
Use magical items to improve your girls, so they can help you build up your harem.

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: The Eadda Channels
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Water on the Restorae Steppes in northern Tres is a valuable resource to the generational farmers in the region. After decades of development and ambitious projects, they have created several channels that feed off the Thetter String Lakes, providing much-needed water to their essential farmland. Recently, a set of large mounds have appeared along the southern lake of Abugurd, spreading panic.

The Eadda Channels is a combat encounter, ranging from 'medium' to 'hard' in difficulty for four to six players and is scalable, starting at 1st level.

boardgame.name: Paths of Darkness
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Paths of Darkness, first of a two-part installment, presents a selection of dreadful master paths for use in Shadow of the Demon Lord. As well as fight alongside a sworn enemy, one might also sacrifice one’s own morals and beliefs to survive, succumbing to the darkness that you might live another day. You might choose to become one of the unbodied, parting your soul from your flesh so that you can invade and control the flesh of others. Or you could become a worm host and develop a symbiotic relationship with the sentient worms that have made your body their home. These paths, and others as well, let you marshal the forces of evil against the Hunger in the Void.

Additionally, these emerging markets have brought about new ways of evaluating your business. Will you take advantage of the new ways to exploit the markets or will your business fall to ruin in this everchanging world?

boardgame.name: Wreck of the Sea Sprite (OSR)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Thought lost after a year at sea the merchant ship Sea Sprite lies wrecked not five miles from home. Driven onto jagged rocks, the ship will not survive the next storm. Her mistress, the wealthy merchant Vilutar Pakkanen, needs stout heroes to board the wreck and recover the ship’s charts and logbook. The only problem, beyond the ship’s condition and the surrounding unpredictable waters, is the wreck lies but a scant bowshot from Gloamhold benighted, doom-drenched halls.

This Dungeon Backdrop is designed to work with the Duchy of Ashlar campaign setting but can be easily inserted into almost any fantasy campaign.

Featuring characters from Shards of Eradine, this game is a light-hearted adventure through the game’s locations, with exclusive content and encounters. boardgame.name: Taimanin Asagi -Battle Arena-
boardgame.description:
Summary of Game
In a near-future Japan where demons, ghouls, and dark beings roam...
The ancient agreement of mutual non-intervention between humans and demons has begun to fall apart as mankind derails to the dark path.
Humans and demons have colluded in criminal gangs and corporations, causing havoc and bringing forth an age of chaos.

But those who follow the path of virtue have not been left powerless.
The government created an organization composed of ninjas with demon-slaying powers to fight the evil forces that plague the world.
Those ninjas were known as the Taimanin.

In the world where darkness roams, a man of ambition and strength has risen to destroy the equilibrium of the three ruling forces and conquer the world.

boardgame.name: Knock! (#1 - Feb 2021)
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

We gathered some of the most respected, most creative, and possibly weirdest minds of the old school roleplaying scene and compiled some of their best work to make this thick magazine. We made KNOCK! the messy, stuffed to the gills bric-à-brac we wanted. The book that earns its place on the easy-to-reach part of your gaming shelves.

It has everything you’d want from an old school slash adventure gaming publication: articles about the history of Dungeons & Dragons, reflections about genre and gameplay, some clever rules, a bunch of maps, tons of random tables and lists, 7 new classes, 7 new monsters, and 3 complete adventures.
boardgame.rpg: Old School Reference and Index Compilation (OSRIC)

boardgame.name: The Heart of Cthulhu
boardgame.description:
The Heart of Cthulhu is a cutthroat card game consisting of three decks and more than 300 cards. This adventure game combines strategy and luck with aspects of RPG. This combination, the game’s unique lore and stunning visuals produce a new adventure every time the game is played.

The game consists of 3 Decks of cards, 110 cards each. The Peril, Pillage and Discovery Decks are shuffled and placed in separate stacks with the Pillage Deck in the middle. Two discovery cards are revealed and placed face up next to the Discovery Deck.

Shuffle the vessel cards and deal one to each captain face down. Captains then reveal their vessels. Take notice of the vessels’ unique strengths. Each captain starts the game with three integrity chips and three pillage cards. Roll to see who goes first.

Players take turns gathering supplies from the pillage deck and paying to reveal discovery cards. The discovery deck contains New Worlds. In order to gain these New Worlds, Captains must defeat perils from the peril deck.

The first player to gain 3 New Worlds wins the game!

—description the designer

boardgame.name: Fap CEO
boardgame.description:
Every gamer has a go-to game. Some play to unwind and put them at ease, others do it for the pure thrill of it. If your entertainment time comes with over the top sexiness, sprinkled with just the right amount of comedy, then FAP CEO is going to hit the spot.

Your rise to the top begins from your very own cam girl studio, where you are in charge of filling up your office with the hottest ladies who are there to not only make the money and contribute to building your empire, but who are also there at your pleasurable disposal. There, you are first introduced to Amber, your sexy ride or die secretary, who helps to keep you organized, and up to date with your daily tasks. Just as in any business, you’ll eventually get to grow your team, and in addition to hiring new girls, you get to know them through over the top sexy conversations as soon as these ladies walk through the door. Not to mention, there is a wide employee pool to pick from, like Chloe, the shy student, or Alexis, the sassy MILF- and so many others.

Your initial impression will be focused on the fun 2D animation (not to mention the double Ds you’ll be working with). Alongside all these great qualities is the engaging dialogue from the girls. The conversations held between you as the big boss and your overly flirtatious employees, accompanied by jazzy background music, are both sweet and exciting. You can look forward to your office babes working to be rewarded with gifts through sexting and kinky pictures, where you can really show them who’s in charge.

Although all these babes are constantly earning money, keep in mind that they can make a little extra with your coaching during private shows. And just like any thriving CEO, you have the ability to spend your money on new hires, promoting them through a level up system, buying gifts for your team and even spicing up your office space to really set the mood.

So get ready to hire hotties and make that dough: it’s time to be the FAP CEO.

Source: The Publisher Website.

Warhammer 2004 Annual is a compilation of Warhammer articles, combined with revised or previously unpublished material. Here you will find rules for all the latest releases, plus gaming articles and additional gaming material.

boardgame.name: Lobo Blanco (2nd Ed)
boardgame.description:
Juego de rol en el mundo de Elric

From the introduction:

Lobo Blanco es un juego de rol hecho por un admirador de la obra de Michael Moorcock. Esta versión del juego se distribuye en forma gratuita. Los personajes, nombres de países y criaturas son copyright de Michael Moorcock y usados como referencia para poder jugar en el mundo de Elric.
...
Lobo Blanco es un juego de rol ambientado en el mundo de Elric de Melniboné, el personaje fantástico más famoso de su autor Michael Moorcock. En este juego ustedes, los jugadores, tomarán el rol de aventureros que siguen sus profundas inquietudes y, en ese recorrido, irán generando todo tipo de eventos con repercusiones cada vez mayores. ¿Podrán seguir sus motivaciones hasta el final sin perecer? ¿Darán a sus personajes un merecido descanso en Tánelorn la Eterna a tiempo? ¿Seguirán sus destinos sin tener que pactar con las fuerzas del Caos y la Ley?

boardgame.name: Wiedźmin: Stary Świat
The Witcher: Old World
Zaklínač: Starý svět
Відьмак: Старий світ
Ведьмак: Старый мир
boardgame.description:
In The Witcher: Old World, you become a witcher — a professional monster slayer — and immerse yourself in the legendary universe of The Witcher franchise.

Set years before the saga of Geralt of Rivia, The Witcher: Old World explores a time when monsters roamed the Continent in greater numbers, creating a constant peril that required the attention of expertly trained monster slayers, known as witchers. Five competing schools trained their adepts through brutal regimes, and once fully prepared, these now-recognized witchers set off to explore the land, seeking trouble and adventures and helping others for coin.

In this competitive adventure board game, 2-5 players travel across a vast map, embarking on masterfully penned quests, encountering and making ambiguous moral choices, fighting monsters — and sometimes brawling with other witchers to defend their school's honor!

The game lets players construct their own unique decks of cards by choosing from a wide range of abilities: attacks, dodges, and witcher combat magic — known as "signs". Through card synergy, players aim to achieve powerful combos as they utilize their witcher school's hallmark abilities to their full potential. Quests, battles, and even dice poker allow each player to earn money, obtain new items, and train their skills.

The first player to acquire 4-6 trophies, with the number being set at the start of play, wins the game instantly. You can obtain trophies by killing monsters, instigating and winning chaotic tavern brawls against another witcher, training attributes to their highest level, and resolving certain quests throughout their adventure.

The game will include a Solo Mode that will allow for a solitaire adventure on the Continent.

boardgame.name: Kamihime PROJECT R
boardgame.description:
Summary of Game
Long, long ago, in an age lost to memory, a civilization of magic and technology flourished. It was destroyed by a great calamity known now as Ragnarok. A thousand generations later, all that remains of that once glorious civilization is a handful of dilapidated ruins. However, dark forces are moving once again, trying to bring about a second Ragnarok. Now only the godlike power of the Kamihime, can stop them.

You and your childhood friend Alyssa find the Device, and ancient contraption that allows you to activate the inter-dimensional gates and traverse the globe, gathering the Kamihime to prepare for battle and prevent catastrophe.

Key Features
~Fully Animated Turn-based Action:
Vibrantly animated turn-based battles allow you to command a squad of Kamihime against a variety of fearsome foes. Use an array of attack, defense, healing, and support Abilities to crush your enemies.

~Co-op Raid Battles
Work together with other players from around the world to take down massive raid bosses. Join with friends to form a union and support each other to crush those who would harm your world.

~Customization
Set up your party to fit your individual play style. Enhance and equip weapons to power up your team to take down fearsome foes.

~Epic Fantasy Story
Your adventure will take you through unique realms in which you will find dastardly enemies and adjuvant allies. Additional quests will allow you to get to know your Kamihime.

~Collectible Kamihime
Whether it be by fighting side by side in main quests, release through the Gacha, or through success in an event, there are numerous ways to expand your team and unleash their powers with the seed of the Successor

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: Blind Men
boardgame.description:
As the nephew of a retired super villain, there's nothing Keegan wants more than to become one himself — and what better way than to join the League of Evil? All he needs to do is commit a crime to complete his application.

Unfortunately, Keegan soon finds himself in more trouble than he could have ever imagined when his plans are interrupted by a couple of spies from opposing agencies.

A solution starts to appear when the head of the guard invites you to diner and offer you an exchange : discreetly find who is blackmailing him and he will let you in.


Vous devez entrer dans la Haute-ville mais elle est fermée aux étrangers, à cause d’une apparition qui terrorise les alentours…

Une solution se profile lorsque le chef de la garde vous invite à dîner et vous propose un échange: trouvez discrètement qui le harcèle et il vous fera entrer.

boardgame.name: Sweet State
boardgame.description:
Summary of Game
Time to inject some excitement, sex appeal and humor into your gaming! It's time to say goodbye to shining gems, cutesy gardens, aging dragons, and tedious quests. Say hello to double-D measurements, triple-X ratings, bombshell actresses, and a healthy dose of adult humor!

Welcome to Pornwood, your new home. This glitz and glamour town is a den of sin where all your fantasies aren’t merely possible but also, in the expert hands of the right girl, likely to be improved!

Key Features

Build a sex empire!*


Become the greatest pimp Pornwood's ever seen by taking to the streets and bringing a world of hurt to other pimps. Claim their patch and their girls. Invest in real estate to ensure all those lonely sailors, “handy”-men and pizza delivery guys get plenty of bang for their buck! But be warned: You're not the only pimp in town who wants to make it big!


Lights, cameras, toys, action!*


The adult film industry is booming in Pornwood and it's time to dust off your old iPON camera. Invite some lady-friends to go wild and get shooting. Whether it's steamy sessions at the photo studio or a sequel to the award-winning "Moaning Lisa's Smile", become the most acclaimed porn director in the whole of Pornwood by scouting for new talent and breaking the law by finding the most outrageous public location for your next nut-buster!

“I was young and needed the money”
Give this sentence a new meaning as you show off your penile kung-fu skills to cruise ships full of meat-hungry cougars. Who wants a 9-5 job when you can make a living by nailing a smile onto the lips of wealthy but unhappy housewives?


United we pimp!*


Get ready for some intense Player-versus-Player action as your gang tries to take over Pornwood. Participate in Fuck Off contests and Gang Wars as you battle for position and resources.

Inspired by classic tongue-in-cheek games such as Lula: The Sexy Empire and Leisure Suit Larry, Sweet State will make you roar with laughter and have you double-checking the room every few seconds for nosy bosses and girlfriends. This game is not work-safe, but who wants that anyway? The only things safe about this game are the condoms!

Rated B for Badass!

Before the Galactic Church of Christ

This card is an infantry unit which will melee attack with 1 red die and defend with 1 red die. It can also be used to charge (move 1 space and attack the same turn). They have the skill Retaliation.

A unit with the retaliation skill can apply a kill or disrupt result from their defence roll to any melee attacking unit. The player must roll the dice of the retaliating unit separately
