boardgame.name: Harem Heroes
boardgame.description:
Summary of Game
Enter a crazy universe where manga girls have gone wild for sex! Create your own harem of the horniest hentai maidens and defeat opponents in thrilling sexual contests.

In Harem Heroes, you'll enjoy a real RPG with tons of uncensored hentai content. Explore a mirror universe of video-game girls, recruit them to your team, grow your harem, and build up your hero to defeat other players in strategic harem battles!

Can you create the mightiest harem of this oversexed world? Find out in Harem Heroes!

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: The Spy Game Mission Booklet 1: Deadly Data
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Mission Introduction
The wind roars through your shattered windshield as the tires of your smashed car scream, smearing a layer of scalding hot rubber across the blistering asphalt.
People dive to safety just as one of the outriders swerves into the passenger side door, causing your vehicle to spew a geyser of electric yellow sparks as your driver side grinds against a concrete wall.

Your foot smashes the pedal and a quick swerve gives you back control of the road. The speedometer passes 90 and the engine snarls as you gain the lead, your team laying down covering fire while you accelerate towards the helipad 80 feet away. The helo’s engine is already running. The target’s on the move. You have seconds to react or they’ll be out of reach forever...

Overview
Deadly Data is a fast paced three-act mission that is designed to keep your players on their toes rather than giving them the luxury of planning every move. It can take place in any coastal city around the world and is the perfect “mission-between-missions”, with potential to spin off into a part of your ongoing campaign. Ideal for a team of 4th-5th level agents, the mission’s final act revolves around the excitement of chase scenes, the rules for which can be found in The Spy Game core rulebook, p.119

Includes maps for Booklet 1 and 2 as a separate PDF

boardgame.name: The Spy Game Mission Booklet 2: Feulish Endeavour
The Spy Game Mission Booklet 2: Fuelish Endeavour
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Mission Introduction
In this mission, assigned by the Caledonian Spy Group (CSG) of Scotland, the team is hired to investigate an American Senator by the name of Jamal Campbell. The senator has been on the campaign trail, transferring money into and out of his account as part of his bid for the U.S. presidency. Most of these donations appear legitimate, but there is more than one item which appears a little too generous for the sender they relate to, and as such the agency has been tasked with investigating the senator’s private financial records. Fortunately, an opportunity to access this information has presented itself…

Overview
Fuelish Endeavour is an infiltration and investigation mission in three-acts, that is designed to give your players a full spy and espionage experience. It is set in the USA for the most part, but can be transplanted to other locations with ease. It's the perfect setup for getting to grips with the system, or as a jump off point for more missions to spin off into a part of your ongoing campaign. Ideal for a team of 4th-5th level agents.

boardgame.description:

Including familiars for witches, extended rules for building the end of the world, and a d66 table of curses.

boardgame.name: Armor Blitz
boardgame.description:
Strategic Real-time Combat

Armor Blitz is a browser and mobile game where you assemble a squad of anime style tank girls from the WWII and Cold War era and lead them to battle. The gameplay consists of a mixture of card collection and real time tug-of-war lane battling.

Armed with a small force of tanks, you must fight back against the invading force of the Corruption. As the commanding officer, it is up to you to give the orders and find the source of the mysterious invasion. Grow your army, manage your tanks, conquer new territory and deploy wisely! Armor Blitz is full of bosses, challenging enemies, and unique encounters. The hand-crafted story, and the diverse set of characters will grow on you as your journey begins. It’s your move, Commander.

GAMEPLAY

Drag and drop to deploy your forces onto the battlefield. Each unique character has their own strengths, weaknesses and powerful abilities.

Change the tide of battle using strategic timing and ability placement. Unlock powerful commander abilities as you advance your military campaign.

Source: The Game Website.


Summary of Game
Welcome to Armor Blitz, where you are the General of a fantastical squad of WWII-era tank girls. Enter Valhalla, the afterlife for fallen spirits. When a mysterious force called The Corruption begins ravaging the lands of Valhalla, it is up to you to take command and vanquish it. Gather your army of tanks, enhance their capabilities in combat, and play strategically.
It's your move, General!

Key Features

Unique Collectible Characters:


Each character you encounter throughout the game is carefully designed with their own history.
All tanks and enemies have hints of background related to their historical past. Level them up and build your relationship status to make them even stronger and to unlock their gorgeous hentai sex scenes!


Strategic Real-time Combat:


This free sex game uses elements of traditional collectible card game mechanics with real-time combat. Lead your army to a pleasurable conclusion both on AND off the battlefield!


Take Control of the Battlefield:


Use abilities, call in reinforcements, and carefully deploy your tanks to yield victory.


Engrossing Story-line:


Follow an exciting storyline as you explore the world of Valhalla, the resting land of the bravest warriors.


Amazing sex scenes:


Keep an eye on your girls and shower them with affection to get some incredibly hot sex scenes!

Enjoy this captivating adult game!

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: Ouroboros (Issue 1)
boardgame.description:

Welcome to the inaugural issue of Ouroboros, our new content resource for Moebius Adventures games such as Aliens & Asteroids and Tattered Magicks!
We have four articles in this first issue:

Castle Calden, Haunted Domain of the Heroux for Tattered Magicks
The Toothy Worms of HD 85512b for Aliens & Asteroids
Unexpected Effects and Difficult Refereeing for Tattered Magicks
Space Station Larceny Ideas for Aliens & Asteroids

boardgame.name: Ouroboros (Issue 2)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Welcome to the second issue of Ouroboros! This issue is nearly twice as big as our first and full of great new content for 'Aliens & Asteroids!
We have four articles in this issue:

A Glitch in the System is our first ever short fiction set in the Aliens & Asteroids universe
The Armstrong Trap is a new short adventure for Aliens & Asteroids from Jonathan Hicks
We offer our first pre-generated character for Aliens & Asteroids with Buddy Lindrick, Space Marine
The Art of N(PCs) for Graduation Day is an article on how to use some of the NPCs (and corporations) found in the sample adventure in the main book

boardgame.name: A Dozen New Druid Feats
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Druids are the unquestioned masters of the natural world, with the ability to assume animal form and sway the forces of life and death in the wilds. This publication presents a dozen new feats for players and storytellers seeking to improve and customize the capabilities of their Druids, including ones that enhance such characters’ use of Wild Shape and Reincarnate. And, while these Feats are written for use with d20 v.3.5 Druids, they can be easily modified for use with the Pathfinder RPG and other OGL-based games.

boardgame.name: Scrap Racer
boardgame.description:
Scrap Racer is a push-your-luck dice game that is suitable for novice gamers or seasoned veterans looking for a raucous experience.

You are a daredevil Scrap Racer who knows only one goal: Win the race—no matter how dangerous!

A race lasts for three laps, and whomever leads the field at that point will be the winner. Each racer needs boldness, tactical skills, and some good luck if they want to be the winner at the end of the race.

On a turn, the active player rolls up to six dice (one at a time) and advances their racer according to the results. But be careful! If you roll doubles, you must draw a crash card and anything can happen—depending on the double you may get a boost or be slowed down, letting others catch up. However, you can gain bonus cards for repeated doubles that can make up for lost position, if used correctly.

Using the unique abilities of the racers and collecting Boost markers, the players can manipulate the outcome of the race to their advantage. On top of all of this, players may have to fight for track position. Whenever two racers share the same space, a duel takes place to decide who will advance by one space and who will stay.

Finally, crossing the finish line will shuffle the racers’ positions due to the effects of the goal cards.

-description from publisher

listing.notes: Includes Kickstarter additions of Expansion 1 and acrylic tiles

Brand new, received from Kickstarter. Includes base game, Expansion #1, and Kickstarter acrylic racing pieces. Everything is unopened, brand new, never played. Shipping is $12.00. boardgame.name: The Assassin
boardgame.description:
(from the back cover)

The Assassin is a solo journaling game played with a deck of cards and a tumbling block tower.

The Assassin is a game about being alone in your own head. It is a game about reconnaissance, waiting, and murder. It is a game about betrayal, abandonment, and loneliness.

boardgame.name: Itékiya
boardgame.description:
In Itékiya the players act at the same time, using one of the options available on the cards shown, throughout twelve turns they will try to perform combos to be able to complete the missions and maximize their scores. It is a game designed so that novice players can play alongside more experienced players, which can take unique challenges that will make a complex gameplay.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Trailblazer
boardgame.description:
In Trailblazer each player creates a 6x6 grid and then attempts to reconstruct their opponent's grid.

A grid is created by entering a number from 1-25 in any space and then entering the next higher number in an adjacent space, and so on, until most or all of the spaces are filled; some spaces can be filled with an "X" instead of a number, but these cannot be adjacent to each other or the first or last spaces of the "trail."

After the grids are created players take turns asking each other for the contents of one space. When a player thinks they can recreate their opponent's grid they do so and win if they are correct.

boardgame.name: Super Fantasy Brawl: Blut im Sand
Super Fantasy Brawl: Circle of Blood
boardgame.description:
Add to the roster of your Champions with the Circle of Blood! This expansion adds Korvash, Mariusz, and Rath to your Champions. Let’s take a look at them! When Korvash grasped the hilt of the old blade he found in the tomb, his mind was consumed with dark visions; promises of a world on fire, and of his enemies kneeling before him. Filled with a desire to make his dreams a reality, he submitted to the presence within the sword, becoming its willing servant. Korvash would go on to take over his tribe, and lead them in a bloody conquest of the Hillsglade. Korvash’s confidence and power grew with every victory. But the visions never stopped, and Scornblade’s hunger was never sated.

The life of Mariusz Demont has never been easy, despite being born into nobility. A member of the Moontouched, Mariusz showed no sign of lycanthropy, relegating him to a life of service to
his older, more blessed brothers. Treated with contempt throughout his life, it was during an attack that left his father Angren dead that Mariusz’s gift revealed itself. Exploding into a rage-filled beast, he slaughtered friend and foe alike, his years of torment blinding him to his bloodlust. Despised by his own people as a traitor, Mariusz counted none his ally as he continued his cursed existence.

As Kilgore’s armies grew, so too did the strength of his enemies. Many enemies were crushed on the battlefield, but others needed a subtler touch. These enemies attract the attention of Rath, Kilgore’s most trusted and lethal assassin. A subterran of incredible agility and ferocity, he is the deadliest weapon in Kilgore’s arsenal, able to slip quietly into any location, and execute his target. Rath served Kilgore loyally for many years, reveling in the chaos and destruction he wrought.

boardgame.name: Super Fantasy Brawl: Art of War
Super Fantasy Brawl: Kunst des Krieges
boardgame.description:
Add to the roster of your Super Fantasy Brawl Champions with the Art of War! This expansion adds Sulka, Ko'lel, and Ahket to your Champions. Let’s take a look at them! Subtle and deceptive, Sulka manipulated her people into a civil war that consumed them, profiting herself with their suffering. Her dark magics and powers over the mind left both sides of the war as putty in her scaled hands, and soon Sulka was poised to control what little remained. Beneath her rule, her people turned to foul, long forbidden magics, and conquered Khemara in short order. Her empire would rule for hundreds of years, and it would be long past Sulka’s time that her people would learn that their success was built on the machinations of evil and greed.

Akhet, the Skylord of Khemara, ruled the nation of Khemara until its dying days. A proud and noble King, Akhet commanded the skies as the bravest warrior his people had ever known, ruling the largest dynasty in the history of Fabulosa. Akhet led the charge in any battle he was a part of, breaking the enemy with his tireless ferocity. Even when a dark and sorcerous force arose to lead their most hated foe to victory, the Skylord led the charge, determined to cast down this hidden evil and bring light to the darkest hour of his people.

Records of the Darkmoon Occupation of Yunkaya speak of the legendary gnome Kolel, and her fearsome mount To’paque. Armed with her deadly blowpipe, her combination of skill, speed, and tactical knowledge was believed to have saved thousands of her people, despite the destruction of her jungle. Whilst she is regarded as the greatest hero in Yunkayan history, to the Moontouched she is the boogeyman; she who brought fear to the forests.

boardgame.name: Pays du Lunévillois: Le jeu
boardgame.description:
Pays du Lunévillois is a local board game based on the principle of questions and answers.

Players start in one of the town centers of the Lunévillois: Blâmont, Einville, Bayon... and then go discover all the sectors with 550 questions relating to geography, history, celebrities....

The winner will have to be the first one to collect 5 "Site" cards by going to their respective box and answering the question correctly.

boardgame.name: Arkane Kräfte
Street Wyrd
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurp:

Power Surge

The power to shape the world can also tear it apart. The power to summon spirits and gain allies can also conjure enemies and lead to your own destruction. And the power to fill objects with magic is also the ability to make them blow up in your face.

Shadowrunners learn about power the hard way—by being on the wrong end of it. That means they often gather it to them however they can, consequences be damned. Street Wyrd is a guide to all sorts of Awakened power, from spells to adept powers to new spirits to enhanced enchanting rules. It also gives runners the power to make their own spells to unleash on their enemies. Because runners know that the power you grab for yourself is the only thing that stays with you.

Street Wyrd is the core magic rulebook for Shadowrun, Sixth World.

boardgame.name: The Story Engine Deck
boardgame.description:
Say goodbye to writer's block.

Get The Story Engine Deck, a set of 180 cards for generating endless creative writing prompts, story ideas, character concepts, D&D campaign ideas, encounter ideas, character ideas, and more.

It runs on a simple, fast, open-ended system of drawing and arranging cards to create customized prompts. Check out the tutorial here.

The deck comes in a magnetic "treasure chest"-style box with a hinged lid that can be laid flat to serve as a play mat. The deck includes an 8-page guidebook to creating different styles of prompt, including multiplayer prompts and collaborative storytelling. yer prompts and collaborative storytelling.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Newer Super Mario Bros Wii: Falling Leaf
boardgame.description:
UNLICENSED GAME




This game is an unlicensed version of New Super Mario Bros. Wii.




Newer: Falling Leaf is an autumnal game based on the Newer framework, released in December 2014. It includes 8 new levels in a variety of themes!

This mod is compatible with all Europe, US and Japan game discs.

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Gone Bunkers
boardgame.description:
Gone Bunkers is a strategy card game. Players take turns building the ultimate hand until someone draws a war card and cannot defeat it. The deck is made up of all types of cards such as; troops, zombies, landmines and of course nukes! Even though your goal is to survive and fight off the war cards, it doesn't mean you can't nuke the player sitting next to you and destroy half their hand.

How to play:
Players take turns by drawing and playing cards until a WAR card is drawn from the deck. Once a WAR card is drawn, that player must defeat that WAR card. Be diplomatic to avoid the WAR, try to fight or be destroyed.

Taking your turn:
Gather all your cards into your hand and look at them. Do one of the following:
1. Draw from the draw pile. If it is a WAR card you can either play Diplomacy card and avoid the WAR or go to WAR and use your troops to defeat the WAR card. You must have the same or greater attack value (attack values are on troop cards) to win the WAR. If you cannot beat the WAR card's value, you lose.
2.Play a card FACE UP on the discard pile and follow the instructions on the card. Note: Zombie cards are placed in front of players not on the discard pile.

Winning the game:
Players will take turns drawing cards, builing their armies and surviving wars. Once one person loses all their cards then the person with the highest attack value (count up your troops attack values) left wins.

Gameplay variations:
Fight to the Death
Play until there is only one player left

15 Round Limit
Play 15 rounds and whomever has the highest attack value left wins

Gameplay Modes:
2 Player Mode
Start with 7 cards each. Each time a WAR card is drawn and a player wins at WAR or plays Diplomacy, put that WAR card back into the deck at random. This will ensure a player loses without the going through the entire deck.

Safe Haven Mode (Fan Favorite)
Do the same initial "Game Setup" except before putting the WAR cards back in the deck, place two cards, per player, face down on the side. Then, complete the regualar game setup and put those extra cards, per player, on top of the deck. This will ensure that each player gets two "safe" turns before a WAR card can be drawn.

boardgame.name: Les Trésors Arvernes
boardgame.description:
Les Trésors Arvernes
A great adventure in the heart of the Auvergne volcanoes.
Search for 2 treasures: the Gallic shield and the Arverne boar, hidden in the middle of the Volcanoes.
Choose your path well.
But beware some may block your way.
Be strategic and judicious in the decisions you make.
Stay alert and don't get distracted.
May luck be with you.
Will you be the first to reach the Puy de Dôme to fly to victory?
The treasure hunt is on.


Les Trésors Arvernes is a treasure hunt in the Auvergne Volcanoes Regional Nature Park.
Goal : find the two treasures hidden under the domes.
Gameplay: players move using cards only.
Transport cards (foot, bicycle, horseback) are numbered from 1 to 4 regardless of the means of transport.
When a player arrives on a dome, he discreetly lifts it to check if there is a treasure below...

boardgame.name: Wtht Vwls
boardgame.description:
Wtht Vwls is a simple word game for any number of players. At the start of each round each player thinks of a word and then writes the consonants in that word, in order, on a slip of paper for each other player.

After all slips have been distributed the players all try to come up with the longest possible word for each set of consonants; they may add any number of vowels before, after, or in between the consonants, but no consonants may be added and the order cannot be changed. (Y is always a vowel in this game.)

When one player has finished they announce the end of the round immediately. Players score a point for every letter in the words they found. An agreed-upon number of rounds is played.

boardgame.name: TRIBES（トライブス）
boardgame.description:
---You are a member of a tribe when humanity was still in its infancy.

We will efficiently collect resources for tribes to live in the harsh natural world and contribute to a rich life..... ---

This game is a resource management and trick-taking card game.

Each players creates several "roles" in the turn and decides the victory by the total of the points given for each "role".

Players use the Elements Cards (Fire, water, soil, wood) to collect resource cards for "Crystal", "Brick", "Apple", and "Charcoal".

After 3 rounds, the player who meets the 8 types of and gets the most "contribution points" wins.

boardgame.name: バロニィ：スペシャルボックス (Barony: Special Box)
boardgame.description:
Barony + Barony:Sorcery in one Box!

Expand your own territory and take control of the Empire!
In the farthest reaches of the Empire, four barons are vying for supremacy. In the farthest reaches of the empire, four barons are vying for supremacy. They use their many knights to expand their territories, building villages, fortresses and cities. Push your way through the ranks, climb the ladder of power and inherit the throne!

Baronies" are baronies. Baronies are baronies, where you are a small local lord and expand your territory.

Dispatch your knights to expand your territory and raise your barony!
The player can choose to perform one of the following actions each turn: "Collect", "Move", "Build", "New City", "Explore" or "Noble Title".

A knight who expands his territory or defends a village can only be obtained by performing a "Collection" action. Knights can be ordered to "move" to expand their territory. Once there, the knights can "build" villages and fortresses, which can then be developed into "new cities".

As you expand and develop your territory, you gain resource tokens, and use these resource token points to gain titles from Baron to Viscount, Count, Marquis and Duke. The game continues until one of the players becomes a duke, and the winner is the player with the most points.

The simple rules are easy to learn, the clear actions are easy to play, but the choices and tactics of each move are interesting, and the game can be played in a relatively short time.

A wind of magic blows through the Barony!
Explore the mysterious land and find the source of the magic!
The Baronies: Special Box includes the expansion set Sorcery, which allows you to play with five players.

It also adds a new element to the game - magic. By chanting spells, players can make spectacularly game-changing moves. But this will only be possible if your opponent gives you enough time!

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

自らの領土を拡大し、帝国の覇権を握れ！
帝国の最果ての地で、4人の男爵が覇権を争っています。彼らは大勢の騎士を使って領土を拡大し、村や要塞、そして都市を築きます。自分の支配権を押し通し、権力の階段を上り、王位を継承してください！

『バロニィ』とは男爵領のこと。プレイヤーは地方の小領主となり、領地を広げていくことになります。

騎士をうまく派遣し領土を広げ爵位をあげる
プレイヤーは「徴集」、「移動」、「建設」、「新たな都市」、「探検」、「貴族の称号」のいずれかのアクションを、毎ターンに1つだけ選んで実行します。

領土を広げたり、村を守る騎士は「徴集」を行わなければ得られません。騎士は「移動」を命じることで、領土を広げていくことができます。移動した先で、騎士は村や要塞を「建設」することができ、村は「新たな都市」へと発展させることができます。

領土を広げて発展させることで資源トークンを得て、この資源トークンの点数を使って男爵から子爵、伯爵、侯爵、公爵と称号を得ていきます。いずれかのプレイヤーが公爵となるまでゲームを続け、得点をもっとも獲得していたプレイヤーが勝者となります。

シンプルなルールは覚えやすく、明確なアクションはプレイもしやすいのですが、その一手一手の選択と駆け引きも悩ましく面白い、比較的短時間でプレイできる陣取りゲームで、美しいアートワークや木製のコマが領地を広げて行く箱庭感も魅力です。

魔力の風が男爵領を吹き抜ける！
神秘の地を探検し、魔力の源を探せ！
『バロニィ：スペシャルボックス』には、拡張セット『ソーサリー』が同梱されており、5人プレイにも対応しています。

また、ゲームに新たな要素――魔法が追加されます。呪文の詠唱によって、プレイヤーは目を見張るほどにゲームを変化させる一手を打つことができます。しかし、それが可能になるのは、対戦相手が充分な時間を与えてくれた場合だけです！

boardgame.name: Duopento
boardgame.description: Each player receives a set of twelve tiles. Alternately, you have to place the stones on the board in such a way that you form as large a contiguous area of a color as possible. At the same time, one should prevent the opponent from doing the same. The tactic: to define as large areas as possible, in which only your own pentominos fit. The whole thing is finished when no one is able to accommodate one of his pentominos on the board.

A wooden box in the form of an 88mm ammunition crate
3 pockets within the box, one for each DRK game set (XLVIII, IISS, AD Kempf)

boardgame.name: Zaratazarat's Manse
boardgame.description:
From the publishers blurb:

Zaratazarat is a mage of dubious reputation and average power. He lives a solitary life in the Fevoriz Marshes, inside a bleak rocky hill he made his abode in. Zaratazarat spent most of his life constructing a summoning platform named Ragga Gyxy’s Random Encounter Table after his inventor. The wizard was going to raise an army of monsters for his own nefarious purpose. He recently completed the construction and was ready to welcome (and bind to his service) the first summoned monsters. But when the fist d4+2 goblins appeared, the overwhelmingly enthusiastic wizard stammered... The goblins knocked him out, argued for a while about what to do with him, and finally left him when an angry ogre appeared on the Table. Since then, Zaratazarat has been hiding and trying to survive in his own lair. The Table is regularly spitting out monsters: most of them try to escape and run back home, or take the opportunity to loot or eat whatever they can...

An adventure for 1st and 2nd level characters - Usable with all manner of adventure games
Monsters are from Old School Essentials Core Rules and OSE Advanced Fantasy Monsters

boardgame.name: Attack On Moe H
boardgame.description:
Summary of Game
Attack on Moe is an epic hentai clicker RPG game where you assemble a small army of cute girls and guys to destroy huge monsters, and their big-chested female masters.

Who needs regular porn games when you can enjoy the sexiest online game this side of the multiverse? Immerse yourself in the world of this epic hentai clicker game!

Slip through the 5th dimension portal and bring pixel power to this 3D hentai game world!

Key Features
STORY

The arrival of giant, titan-like girls known as Moetan has wreaked havoc in the defenseless Pixel Kingdom. Only one man can stop them! That man is you, The Pink-Haired Sword Dude. You must lead the Pixel people to victory by any means necessary. Equipped only with your courage and your big sword, you make your stand on top of a mountain.
As you cut down anime girls one after another, the discouraged Pixel people will be inspired to join you. They come from hiding to aid you on the frontline for this final battle for their survival.
Team up with fierce allies, capture the rampant Moetan, and turn them from foes to sex-loving friends!

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: Sriracha
boardgame.description:
Transform the city of Sriracha into a coastal paradise!

Sriracha is a fun and challenging resource management game in which you and your friends take the role of builders competing to make the most of their precious time and resources. Decisions need to be made at every step of the game. Do you want to take turns early to get access to the ship carrying the resources you want before anyone else takes it? Or perhaps if you take turn a bit later you can get a better deal?

Be careful and choose wisely because every ship comes with a mandatory project you must try to complete as soon as possible. You must collect enough resources for the projects you have in order to complete them. Completing a project not only grants you victory points, but also additional resources to be allocated into other ones! Can you become victorious in this battle of wit after three rounds?

boardgame.name: Guardiões da Terra
boardgame.description:
A didactic game to make as a family and teach the planet's values to the youngest.

"Shall We Save the Planet?

Pollution is getting stronger and Planet Earth is getting sicker.
Since you can't beat it alone, the Planet has summoned the Guardians of the Earth for an urgent cleaning mission.
Guardians have to act quickly and they need you.
Join them on this adventure and find out how you can help.
Learn how to clean beaches and seas with Solis and Gotas, discover "magic" foods with Bia, protect forests with Flora and become an expert in energy savings with Chamas.

Purpose of the game:
Players must move clockwise around the board to accumulate energy points and / or special "Guardian" cards.
There are two ways to win the game:
- Be the first player to get 50 energy points.
- Be the first player to acquire 6 special "Guardian" cards (one from each).
Players who run out of energy points immediately exit the game, as do their cards."

boardgame.name: Bitch Hunter
boardgame.description:
Summary of Game
Have you ever fucked a pigeon-slut? Liberated the country from dictatorship of a sex tyrant? And have you returned to the past to give people the fire, at the same time giving them your dick? *We bet you haven’t.*

This is only a tiny part of what you have to do in the role of bitch hunter in this mind-blowing game.

In the comic based RPG Bitch Hunters, you have an amazing opportunity to lead your character through insane worlds full of lust and debauchery. You will create your gang of horny hunters, compete with other players in turn-based online battles, going through hundreds of stories that you could not imagine even in the wildest fantasies.

Will you dare to become the Hunt King in an underground bitch loving empire? You have to try.

Key Features
- Unique storytelling with hundreds of uncensored adult comix
- Intuitive gameplay
- Сreate your sex-cell and top the leaderboards
- RPG system of skills and upgrades, tons of loot and equipment
- Build and level up your city
- Exciting PVP bottles

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Alien Catacombs
boardgame.description:
This box contains everything you need to build a single-level gaming board covering an area of up to 2′ x 2′ / (600mm x 600mm) or larger, set in a seemingly uninhabited First Born asteroid base. All the pieces are modular and can be assembled in any combination you choose for a different set-up every time. The set includes a neoprene gaming mat.

The terrain is supplied flat-packed on high-quality, high-density card, printed in full colour on both sides, so no painting required! The terrain requires assembly, and some smaller parts will require glue.

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Trader Encampment
boardgame.description:
This box contains everything you need to build a single-level gaming board covering an area of up to 2′ x 2′ / (600mm x 600mm) or larger, set in a makeshift settlement constructed in the ruins of a First Born asteroid base. All the pieces are modular and can be assembled in any combination you choose for a different set-up every time. The set includes a neoprene gaming mat.

The terrain is supplied flat-packed on high-quality, high-density card, printed in full colour on both sides, so no painting required! The terrain requires assembly, and some smaller parts will require glue.

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Ruined Catacombs
boardgame.description: This pack contains an assortment of modular wall and floor sections that can either be assembled as standalone structures or combined with the standard Alien Catacombs pieces to ruin a larger setup.

boardgame.name: Η Χιονάτη και οι 7 Νάνοι
boardgame.description:
Each player has to get first to the house of the 7 Dwarfs and save the Snow White before she bites the poisoned apple!

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Trade Container

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Alien Catacomb Walls
boardgame.description: A single sheet of walls and accessories, identical to those in the First Born Starter Set and Alien Catacombs terrain set.

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Alien Catacomb Entrances
boardgame.description: A single sheet of entrances and accessories, identical to those in the First Born Starter Set and Alien Catacombs terrain set.

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Alien Catacomb Scatter
boardgame.description: A single sheet of scatter terrain, identical to those in the First Born Starter Set and Alien Catacombs terrain set.

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Alien Catacomb Ruins
boardgame.description: A single sheet of ruined walls and accessories, identical to those in the Trader Encampment and Ruined Catacombs terrain sets.

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Alien Catacombs Gaming Mat
boardgame.description: A 2′ x 2′ / 60cm x 60cm gaming mat depicting a rocky asteroid surface with carved alien designs. It is printed in high quality on fabric with a 1mm neoprene backing. It can be combined with similar mats to make a larger battlefield and can be rolled or folded for easy storage.

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Utility Dashboards
boardgame.description: This pack contains everything you need to upgrade your Traders with powerful new equipment – exo-suits, utility belts, bandoleers and more.

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Enhanced Ship Dashboard
boardgame.description: This pack contains everything you need to upgrade a single crew with a named ship. This product cannot be used as a standalone product – it requires the First Born Kickstarter Edition or the Ships of Disrepute Expansion.

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Trader Dashboards
boardgame.description: This pack contains enough plastic Dashboards and Pegs (with spares) for a complete Trader crew, just like the ones in the starter set. These are vital for multiplayer games – you will need one set per crew beyond any sets in the boxed games. If you want to use your Prospectors and Hunters as a third crew you will need an extra set.

boardgame.name: Core Space: Clip Bases
boardgame.description:
This pack contains 16 rubber base rings in four different colours. These rings fit over the bases of the minis to tell different crews apart at a glance.

One pack will give you enough for four crews, or six in conjunction with the blue and green rings in the original Core Space Starter Set.

boardgame.name: Core Space: Dry-Wipe Pen
boardgame.description: Core Space campaigns require a dry-wipe pen to mark your Traders’ career advancements and ship upgrades.

boardgame.name: Core Space: First Born – Reference Cards
boardgame.description:
The Core Space rulebook has a comprehensive reference section at the back, with everything you need to know to use all the skills, abilities and equipment in the game, as well as a reminder of the turn sequence, actions, and other useful information.

This pack takes all of this information and prints it onto a deck of reference cards, so you can just pick the ones relevant to the crew/mission you are playing and have them at the side of the board without the need for a rulebook.

boardgame.name: Hey, Corona! USA
boardgame.description:
Born out of the odd experiences that hit the nation over the last few months, Hey Corona! is an outrageously fun card game where you try to stockpile as much toilet paper as you possibly can, while keeping yourself virus free by playing various action cards! Simple yet strategic, this game is great for all ages and perfect for socially distanced groups and families.

Save as much toilet paper as you possibly can in your "stockpile" of six face-down cards. Use action cards to switch out what you are hoarding and try to get rid of any cards with the virus.

At the end of each round, Toilet Paper Cards add points and Corona Cards take points away. Player with the most points at the end of 4 rounds wins.

From the Kickstarter and website descriptions.

boardgame.name: Bodeham Castle: Under Construction

Contents: The construction site of a large medieval castle. Walls are in various levels of completion, with wooden platforms, cranes and masonry around.

boardgame.name: Midgard Magic: Ley Lines
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

By the Power of the Land!

Magic pervades all of Midgard, and ley lines are its wellspring. Those who know how to tap into these rivers of magical power find great reward—and of course risk. Brimming with this new potential, you are able to manipulate this magic like no other, boosting magical effects and powering new spells and items, even traveling the span of the world. There is no limit to what a little knowledge of ley lines can bring. The 32 pages of Midgard Magic: Ley Lines bring the secrets of the ley lines into your 5E campaign, featuring:

A new ley line circle for druids and an archetype for rangers, harnessing the power of ley lines
Guidelines on incorporating and finding ley lines in your game
New uses for ley lines, such as critical effects and revised effects tables
Plus 12 spells and magic items, such as ley teleportation and line discharge, a new monster, and more!


Your skill at finding and harnessing the wild, mutable power of ley lines brings you control over the lifeblood of Midgard itself. The power of the land flows through you—channeling through your fingertips into marvelous effects. For you, magic is everywhere and dynamic, offering great power and a bit of the unpredictable. A fine trade for any daring adventurer!

boardgame.name: Killing Monsters in the Atomic Age
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Killing Monsters in the Atomic Age is the sixteenth in a series of "Zine Supplements" for #iHunt: The RPG. Or as we'd like to call them, "Zupplements." It's also the second in our Season Three series of zupplements, each detailing a different decade of the 20th century in the world of #iHunt.

This one details the 1950s, and it's a whopping 50 pages long!

Inside, you'll find:

Novelist Daniel Swensen provided an AMAZING short story for this book called The Beast of Appetite. It's 1950s style detective pulp, but with an #iHunt twist. You're gonna love this one.
We give a whole bunch of historical factoids and bits about the atomic age, and we tie each of them to the world of #iHunt and San Jenaro. Every point about the history, we couple with a stunt to help marry your characters to the setting and mood.
Four new hunter organizations. From housewives frustrated they've been pushed back into domesticity, to Korean War vets using an experimental drug to see the unseen, we've got tons of stories ready for you to play.
Then we've got a fully fleshed-out adventure for you called Easy (Un)Living in the Burbs. It's a bit of a heist against a vampire who bought up some property and treated his workers like garbage. It's a new experiment for how to present adventures for #iHunt, and we'd LOVE to hear what you think.
Then we've got monsters. Four of them. All inspired by the period. All fun. All weird. All very #iHunt, but with a 50s sensibility.

boardgame.name: Meeples & Monsters: Kickstarter Edition
boardgame.description:
The peaceful city of Rowan is surrounded by dangerous monsters. It’s up to the citizens to fortify the city, train up warriors, clerics, knights, and mages, and defend Rowan in Meeples & Monsters!

Meeples & Monsters is a big, beautiful bag-building engine builder by designer Ole Steiness (Champions of Midgard and more). Depth, replayability, beautiful components, and a splash of meeple humor will have you coming back for “just one more play” game night after game night!

During a players turn, they draw meeples out their bag and use those meeples to perform various actions on the board. Those actions include upgrading your meeples, adding new meeples to your bag, fighting monsters, investigating towers, or even upgrading the town giving players even more options on future turns. At the end of a player’s turn, all the meeples they drew are put onto the “lodging” part of the player’s board.
During the game, players will score victory points by defeating monsters, completing quests, and investigating towers. At the end of the game, players will score additional victory points by fighting boss monsters and through end of game quests. The player with the most victory points wins!

This Kickstarter edition includes a bunch of upgrades and extras, including the 4-towers expansion (20 tiles) and everything you need to play the solo version (7 Royal Guard Order Tiles, 1 Royal Guard Board).

—description from the publisher

NOTE: The retail edition can be found here: Meeples & Monsters.
